Description: Amidst the vast waters that held many mysteries within, the fishermen of that time found themselves a sophisticated artifact, well-defined by its large arrow that could shift its position. Regardless of where they went, the arrow was always known to bring them home. Later known as the "compass", the people believed that such an esteemed masterpiece ought to be preserved, its components carefully refurbished throughout the years by the skillful hands of their leader, Argus. Withstanding against the ravages of time, this very same artifact continues to guide the enstranged beings even in the afterlife.
